parameters.name: Sheet
parameters.description: Sheet (layout) name of the input file or an empty string for all sheets

parameters.name: Merge
parameters.description: True to merge near-identical points, false to not

parameters.name: Distance
parameters.description: Distance to determine whether two points should be merged

title: IImportDxfDwgData.SetMergePoints
description: Sets whether near-identical points within the specified distance are merged in the part sketch after entities are imported.
signature:
System.Boolean SetMergePoints( 
   System.String
Sheet
,
   System.Boolean
Merge
,
   System.Double
Distance
)

parameters.name: Sheet
parameters.description: Sheet (layout) name of the input file or an empty string for all sheets

parameters.name: Merge
parameters.description: True to merge near-identical points, false to not

parameters.name: Distance
parameters.description: Distance to determine whether two points should be merged

returns: True if near-identical points within the specified distance are merged, false if not
remarks:
This property only supports importing to a part sketch; it does not support importing to a drawing.
By default, points within 0.001mm are merged.

examples.title: Import DXF file into Part Sketch (VBA)
